description.fr: {%FightTurnEnded} Inflige {value:Weapon.161.s,percent} de l’{%AT} de votre héros en plus aux adversaires autour de vos SINISTROS.
description.en: {%FightTurnEnded} Also inflicts {value:Weapon.161.s,percent} of your hero's {%AT} on opponents around your SINISTROS.
description.es: {%FightTurnEnded} Inflige un {value:Weapon.161.s,percent} más del {%AT} de tu héroe a los adversarios de alrededor de tus SINISTROS.
description.de: {%FightTurnEnded} Verursacht bei den Gegnern ringsum\_ deiner SINISTROS {value:Weapon.161.s,percent} des {%AT} deines Helden als Zusatzschaden.
description.pt: {%FightTurnEnded} Inflige mais {value:Weapon.161.s,percent} do {%AT} do seu herói aos adversários em\_volta\_ dos seus SINISTROS.
